content: So I think what we've really spent our time on over the last four to six months as we've seen our fleet use -- get -- reach this 97% utilization, give or take, maybe that we're going to have at the end of Q1 or early Q2 on reciprocating fleet that we're going to have shop space available, and we've been very much focused on filling that shop space up with AMS work where possible, that's good quality work.
